            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-fa49192c-892a-44bc-8bc5-8fa223d5cf45');

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-8ff4de77-b230-4267-b4c1-29c0b7a1d065');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="LOLLAPALOOZA EM FOTOS">

            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-21f3ee12-6d53-4f71-88b1-368320a3b7fe');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();

                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                        class="card-lista-item-figure card-lista-item-img gui-image-full gui-image-scale"
                        alt="Maioria da cúpula da Petrobras envolvida na Lava Jato está solta"
                        title=""><img src="http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/static/live/common/img/pixel.gif"

                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><style>

.agrupamento-vertical-simples .glb-hl-style-informe-publicitario .chapeu {
    color: #fff !important;
}

.nano>.pane {
    z-index: 12;
}
</style><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    window.onload= function() {
         if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
     }
})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 18:26:00 --></html>

$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/pi/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"

setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>

</div><section class="index-conteudo faixa-12"><div class="ODIJSI007-publicidades-topo grid-12 "><div id="pub-intervencao" style="z-index:9999999999;top:390px;position:absolute;left:50%;margin-left:-470px;overflow:hidden;display:none;"></div>    <div id="pub-dhtml" style="z-index:9999999999;top:390px;position:absolute;left:50%;margin-left:-200px;overflow:hidden;display:none;"></div>    <div id="topclick" class="publicidade"></div>    <div id="video-area" class="video-area" style="margin-top:5px;position:relative;display:none;width:100%;overflow:hidden; height:0px;"></div>    <div id="bottomclick" style="display:none;">        <div id="retraido" style="position:relative; top:0;"></div>        <div id="expandido" style="position:relative; top:0;"></div>    </div></div><div id="area-1"><div id="3E4B31FB-AE2C-4893-936D-22265AC4AE27" class="faixa-6"><div class="ODICHE01006 grid-6 entre-componentes" id="955E2FE0-19EB-41A0-B39F-CC7ECC7C463C">
    <a href="http://blogs.odia.ig.com.br/justicaecidadania/2017/03/27/secretaria-nao-responde-a-ataque-do-tj-contra-atraso-no-pagamento-de-salarios/" title="Secretaria evita atacar o TJ contra atraso de salários dos magistrados">

<script>

    function shareWindow(wprop,hprop,vurl){
        var _h, _g;
        _h = (window.innerWidth / 2) - (wprop / 2);
        _g = (window.innerHeight / 2) - (hprop / 2);
        window.open(vurl, "", "toolbar=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=no, copyhistory=no, width=" + wprop + ", height=" + hprop + ", top=" + _g + ", left=" + _h);
    }

    $(document).ready(function() {

        $(document).on('click', '.quickly-share .facebook', function() {
            var _mywidth = 626, _myheight = 436, _url = '';
            _url = 'https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=';
            _url += encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-url'));
            
            shareWindow(_mywidth,_myheight,_url);
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.quickly-share .twitter', function() {
            var _mywidth = 685, _myheight = 500, _url = '', _title = $(this).attr('data-title');
            
            _url = 'http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=' + _title + '&url=';
            _url += encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-url'));
            
            shareWindow(_mywidth,_myheight,_url);
        });
        
    });

</script></div><div class="EJEHTML00112" id="293FC1EE-4415-408A-852E-8BDB0E945297">

		    tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";

		    firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);

<script>
    var empilhamentoMaislidas = (function() {

    	var json;

    	var maisLidas = function (periodo, limite) {

			switch(periodo) {
				case 'today':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
				break;
				case 'weekend':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-weekend.json';
				break;
				case 'week':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-week.json';
				break;
				case 'month':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-month.json';
				break;
				default:
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
			}

			$('.ODILA00103 ul').html('<li style="border-bottom:0;"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/odia20/ring.gif" width="30" height="30"></li>');

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {

				var html = '';
				var i = 1;
                
	            $.each(data.registros, function(key, val) {

	            	if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {
	            		html += '<li class="titulo entre-componentes"><a href="' + val.url + '" title="' + val.title + '">' + val.title + '</a></li>';
	                }
	                i++;

	            });

	            $('.ODILA00103 ul').html(html);

	        });

    	}

    	return {
            maisLidas: maisLidas
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	empilhamentoMaislidas.maisLidas('today', 5);

    });
</script></div></div><div id="34D3C408-B07F-408A-9080-95A3117C4C73" class="faixa-3"><div class="EJEHTML00112" id="E171FEB8-5DFD-477C-A79D-8369F1C90EB8">

			<a class="anuncie" href="http://classificadosodia.com.br/panel/login?continue_to=/panel/ads/insert" target="_classificados">Anuncie</a>
		</form>

	<div class="timer">
		<div class="progress "></div>
	</div>
	<div id="bx-pager">
		<a data-slide-index="0" href="">Veículos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="1" href="">Imóveis</a>
		<a data-slide-index="2" href="">Empregos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="3" href="">Serviços e Produtos</a>

<script>
    var destaquesClassificados = (function() {

    	var vitrine = function (limite) {

			var json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/odia/classificados/highlights.json';

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {
				
				var html = '';
                
	            $.each(data, function(key, val) {

	            	var i = 1;

	            	html += '<li>';
					html += '	<ul>';

	            	$.each(val, function(key2, val2) {

	            		var title 		= val2.title;
	            		var description = val2.description;
	            		var city 		= val2.city;
	            		var estate 		= val2.estate;
	            		var price 		= val2.price;
	            		var thumb 		= val2.thumb;
	            		var url 		= val2.url;
	            		var logo		= val2.client.logo;
	            		var url_cliente = val2.client.url;

	            		if(city == null || city == ''){
	            			city = '';
	            		}else{
	            			city = city +' - ';
	            		}

	            		if(price == null || price == '' || price == '0,00'){
	            			price = '';
	            		}else{
	            			price = 'R$ '+ price;
	            		}

	            		if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {

		            		html += '	<li>';
							html += '		<a href="'+ url +'" target="_classificados">';
							html += '			<img src="'+ thumb +'" width="158" height="100" />';
							html += '			<h3>'+ title.substr(0, 12) +'</h3>';
							html += '			<p>'+ description.substr(0, 50); +'</p>';
							html += '			<h4>'+ city + estate +'</h4>';
							if(val != 'jobs'){
								html += '			<h5>'+ price +'</h5>';
							}
							html += '		</a>';

							if(logo !== null && logo !== '') {
								html += '<div class="logo-client">';
									if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '<a href="'+url_cliente+'" target="_blank">';
									}
		            				html += '<img src="'+ logo +'" width="110" height="50" />';
		            				if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '</a>';
									}
		            			html += '</div>';
		            		}

							html += '	</li>';

						}

						i++;

	            	});

	            	html += '	</ul>';
					html += '</li>';

	            });

	            $('ul.classificado-odia').html(html);

	        });

			vitrineCarrossel();

    	}

    	var vitrineCarrossel = function () {
    		setTimeout(function(){
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					slider = $(".classificado-odia").bxSlider({
						pagerCustom: '#bx-pager',
						auto: true,
						autoControls: false,
						pause: 5000,
						speed:500,
						infiniteLoop:true,
						autoHover: true,
						onSliderLoad: function (currentIndex) {
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideBefore: function(){			
							$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideAfter: function(){
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},		
						controls: false
					});
					$( ".classificado-odia" ).mouseenter(function() {
						$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
					}).mouseleave(function() {
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
					});
					$( "#bx-pager a" ).click(function(){		
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						setTimeout(function(){
						  slider.startAuto();
						}, 200);
					});
				});
				}, 1000);
    	}

    	var vitrineBusca = function () {
    		var form = document.getElementById('form-classificados-busca');
			form.submit();
			return false;
    	}

    	return {
            vitrine: vitrine,
            vitrineCarrossel: vitrineCarrossel,
            vitrineBusca: vitrineBusca
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	destaquesClassificados.vitrine(6);

    });
</script></div></div></div></section><footer class="footer-odia"><div class="footer-topo"><div class="faixa-12"><div class="grid-6 indices"><h5>Editorial</h5><nav><ul><!-- <li><a <div class="widget destaque ultimas-home-moda-e-beleza">

    
        <div class="widget-titulo">
            <h2 class="titulo"><a class="animated" href="/noticias">últimas</a></h2>
            <div class="atualizacao">atualizado há 5 minutos</div>
            <span class="fio"></span>
        </div>

        <ul class="midias">
            
                
                <li class="midia materia primeira ">

    <script type="text/javascript">glb.runner.push(function(global,$){if(!glb.destaqueWideEgoResized){$('.destaque-wide-ego').each(function(){var $this=$(this),$parents,$siblings=$this.siblings('.destaque-wide-ego');if($siblings.length>0){$parents=$this.parents();if($parents.filter('.moda-e-beleza')&&$parents.filter('.glb-grid-4')){$siblings.find('.foto').addClass('expanded');}}});glb.destaqueWideEgoResized=true;}});</script>



    </div>

            <div class="infos">
              <a href="http://horoscopo.ego.globo.com/signos/aries">
                <h3 class="signo">Áries</h3>
              </a>

              <p class="periodo">
                  <time datetime="2017-03-21">21/03</time> a

toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" 	<ul>
		<li>
			<a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/rio-de-janeiro/2017-03-27/bombeiros-encontram-corpo-de-triatleta-que-sumiu-durante-competicao.html" title="Encontrado corpo de triatleta que desapareceu no mar do Recreio">
				<span class="chapeu">MORTO DURANTE A PROVA</span>
				<div class="dados">
					<h2>Encontrado corpo de triatleta que desapareceu no mar do Recreio</h2>
					<h3></h3>
				</div>

<script>

var max_fotos = 5, max_videos = 2, max_size_foto = 5000000, max_size_video = 30000000;

    var conexaoLeitor = {

        videos: [],
        fotos: [],
        erros: [],
    
        get_filetype : function(file) {
            if (file.type) {
                return file.type
            }
            var imgFormatos = ["jpg", "jpeg", "png", "gif", "bmp"];
            var videoFormatos = ["moov", "3g2", "3gp", "3gp2", "3gpp", "asf", "avi", "divx", "dv", "dvx", "f4v", "flv", "h263", "m4e", "m4v", "wmv", "mov", "movie", "mp4", "mpg", "mpeg", "qt", "rm", "webm", "ogv"];
            var cut = file.name.split(".").pop();
            if (imgFormatos.indexOf(cut) >= 0) {
                return "image/" + cut
            }
            if (videoFormatos.indexOf(cut) >= 0) {
                return "video/" + cut
            }
            return "application/octet-stream"
        },

        adiciona_arquivos: function(cut) {

            for (i = 0; i < cut.length; i += 1) {

                var extensao = this.get_filetype(cut[i]);

                if (extensao.match("video/.*")) {

                    if (this.videos.length >= max_videos) {

                        var mensagem = "Atenção: Só é permitido o envio de " + max_videos;
                        mensagem += max_videos == 1 ? " vídeo" : " vídeos";
                        this.erros.push({
                            filename: cut[i]["name"],
                            message: mensagem
                        })

                    } else {

                        if (cut[i].size > this.max_size_video) {
                            this.erros.push({
                                filename: cut[i]["name"],
                                message: "O vídeo excedeu o limite de 30 MB"
                            })
                        } else {
                            this.videos.push(cut[i]);
                        }

                    }
                }

                if (extensao.match("image/.*")) {

                    if (this.fotos.length >= max_fotos) {

                        var mensagem = "Atenção: Só é permitido o envio de " + max_fotos;
                        mensagem += max_fotos == 1 ? " imagem" : " imagens";
                        this.erros.push({
                            message: mensagem
                        })

                    } else {

                        if (cut[i].size > this.max_size_video) {
                            this.erros.push({
                                message: "O vídeo excedeu o limite de 5 MB"
                            })
                        } else {
                            this.fotos.push(cut[i]);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            this.lista_arquivos()

        },


        remove_arquivo: function(a) {
            this[a.type].splice(a.index, 1);
            this.lista_arquivos()
        },


        linha_erro_template: function(b, c) {
            var a = "<li class='linha-erro'>";
            a += b;
            a += " *** " + c + " ***";
            a += "</li>";
            return a
        },


        linha_template: function(c, a, d) {

            var b = "<li>";
            
                if (d == "videos") {
                    b += '<span class="tipo">Vídeo:</span> '
                } else {
                    b += '<span class="tipo">Imagem:</span> '
                }
            
                b += c;
                b += " <a href='' class='remover-anexo' data-type='";
                b += d + "' data-index='";
                b += a;
                b += "'>[X]Remover</a></li>";

            return b
        },


        lista_arquivos: function() {

            $(".lista-arquivos").text("");
            
            for (arquivo in this.videos) {
                $(".lista-arquivos").append(this.linha_template(this.videos[arquivo]["name"], arquivo, "videos"))
            }
            
            for (arquivo in this.fotos) {
                $(".lista-arquivos").append(this.linha_template(this.fotos[arquivo]["name"], arquivo, "fotos"))
            }
            
            for (erro in this.erros) {
                $(".lista-arquivos").append(this.linha_erro_template('', this.erros[erro]["message"]))
            }
            
            if (this.erros.length) {
                var tempo = this.erros.length <= 4 ? this.erros.length * 5000 : 10000;
                setTimeout(function() {
                    $(".linha-erro").fadeOut()
                }, tempo);
                this.erros = []
            }
        },

        reset: function() {
            this.videos = [];
            this.fotos = [];
            this.erros = [];
            this.lista_arquivos()
        },


        isEmailValid: function(email) {
            var filter = /^([\w-\.]+)@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.)|(([\w-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2,4}|[0-9]{1,3})(\]?)$/;
            return filter.test(email);
        },

        check_for_errors: function() {

            var liberado = true;

            $($("#form-envio").find("input[data-required=true], textarea[data-required=true]")).each(function(){
                    
                if(!$.trim($(this).val())){ 
                    $(this).css( {'border-width':'2px', 'border-color':'red'} ); 
                    liberado = false; 
                }

                var email_reg = /^([\w-\.]+@([\w-]+\.)+[\w-]{2,4})?$/; 
                
                if($(this).attr("type")=="email" && !email_reg.test($.trim($(this).val()))){
                    $(this).css( {'border-width':'2px', 'border-color':'red'} ); 
                    liberado = false;           
                }   

            }).on("input", function(){
                $(this).css({ 'border-color':'#ccc', 'border-width':'1px'});
            });

            if( !$.trim($('#recaptcha_response_field').val()) ) {
                $('#recaptcha_response_field').css( {'border-width':'2px', 'border-color':'red'},function() {

                }).on("input", function(){
                    $(this).css({'border-color':'#ccc', 'border-width':'1px'});
                }); 

                liberado = false; 
            }

            var campoResponsabilidade = $("#autorizacao");
            if (campoResponsabilidade.is(':checked') != true) {
                $('.texto-checkbox').css( {'font-weight':'bold', 'color':'red'} );
                liberado = false;
            }

            return liberado;
            
        },

        init: function() {

            $("#selecionar-arquivos").click(function() {
                $("#fileupload").click()
            });

            $("#fileupload").change(function(b) {
                if (!$(this).val()) {
                    return
                }
                conexaoLeitor.adiciona_arquivos(this.files);
                $(this).val("");
            });

            var a = /(iPad|iPhone|iPod)/g.test(navigator.userAgent);
            
            if (a && this.max_videos) {
                $("#fileupload").removeAttr("multiple")
            }

            Recaptcha.create("6Lfxt-ESAAAAAI2zyIhASHjlwKPmedRdYbcSDZ8R", 'recaptcha_div', {
                theme: "white",
                lang : 'pt'
            });

            $(".lista-arquivos").on("click", ".remover-anexo", function(d) {
                d.preventDefault();
                var b = $(this);
                var c = b.data();
                b.parent().fadeOut(function() {
                    conexaoLeitor.remove_arquivo(c)
                })
            });

            $(".EJETOE00404").css ('display' , 'block');
        }
    };

    $(function() {
        conexaoLeitor.init();
    });

    $("form#conexao").submit(function(e){

        e.preventDefault();
        var liberado = conexaoLeitor.check_for_errors();

        try {

            if(liberado) {

                $('#form-envio').addClass('blur');
                $('.layer, .status').css('display','block');
                $('.status h2').html('Por favor, aguarde enquanto sua colaboração é enviada...');

                var data = new FormData($('#conexao')[0]);

                data.append("name", $("#name").val());
                data.append("email", $("#email").val());
                data.append("phone", $("#phone").val());
                data.append("details", $("#details").val());
                data.append("recaptcha_response_field", $("#recaptcha_response_field").val());
                data.append("recaptcha_challenge_field", $("#recaptcha_challenge_field").val());

                for (arquivo in conexaoLeitor.fotos) {
                    data.append("files[]", conexaoLeitor.fotos[arquivo]);
                }

                for (arquivo in conexaoLeitor.videos) {
                    data.append("files[]", conexaoLeitor.videos[arquivo]);
                }

                $.ajax({    
                    url: 'http://cadun.ejesa.com.br/endpoints/connection/post',
                    type: 'POST',
                    data: data,
                    contentType: false,
                    processData: false,
                    async: true,
                    
                    success: function(obj) {

                        console.log('Entrou em Sucesso');
                        var aux = jQuery.parseJSON(obj);
                        console.log(aux);

                        $('.status h2').html('Dados enviados com sucesso!');
                        $('.status .loading').css('display','none');

                        setTimeout(function(){

                            $('#form-envio').removeClass('blur');
                            $('.status').css('display','none');
                            $("#form-envio").children().unbind('click');

                            $("#conexao :input").each(function() {
                                this.value = "";
                            });

                            $(".lista-arquivos").text("");
                            $(".lista-arquivos").find('ul').html('');

                            Recaptcha.reload();
                        },3000);

                    }

                });

            }

        } catch(e) {}

        return false;
    });

</script>

<script>
    var empilhamentoMaislidas = (function() {

    	var json;

    	var maisLidas = function (periodo, limite) {

			switch(periodo) {
				case 'today':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
				break;
				case 'weekend':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-weekend.json';
				break;
				case 'week':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-week.json';
				break;
				case 'month':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-month.json';
				break;
				default:
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
			}

			$('.ODILA00103 ul').html('<li style="border-bottom:0;"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/odia20/ring.gif" width="30" height="30"></li>');

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {

				var html = '';
				var i = 1;
                
	            $.each(data.registros, function(key, val) {

	            	if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {
	            		html += '<li class="titulo"><a href="' + val.url + '" title="' + val.title + '">' + val.title + '</a></li>';
	                }
	                i++;

	            });

	            $('.ODILA00103 ul').html(html);

	        });

    	}

    	return {
            maisLidas: maisLidas
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	empilhamentoMaislidas.maisLidas('today', 5);

    });
</script></div><div class="publicidade ODIPUB00203 grid-3" id="0036A54A-D1EC-4865-8B97-6EE2CD512BE0">

<script>
    var destaquesClassificados = (function() {

    	var vitrine = function (limite) {

			var json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/odia/classificados/highlights.json';

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {
				
				var html = '';
                
	            $.each(data, function(key, val) {

	            	var i = 1;

	            	html += '<li>';
					html += '	<ul>';

	            	$.each(val, function(key2, val2) {

	            		var title 		= val2.title;
	            		var description = val2.description;
	            		var city 		= val2.city;
	            		var estate 		= val2.estate;
	            		var price 		= val2.price;
	            		var thumb 		= val2.thumb;
	            		var url 		= val2.url;
	            		var logo		= val2.client.logo;
	            		var url_cliente = val2.client.url;

	            		if(city == null || city == ''){
	            			city = '';
	            		}else{
	            			city = city +' - ';
	            		}

	            		if(price == null || price == '' || price == '0,00'){
	            			price = '';
	            		}else{
	            			price = 'R$ '+ price;
	            		}

	            		if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {

		            		html += '	<li>';
							html += '		<a href="'+ url +'" target="_classificados">';
							html += '			<img src="'+ thumb +'" width="158" height="100" />';
							html += '			<h3>'+ title.substr(0, 12) +'</h3>';
							html += '			<p>'+ description.substr(0, 50); +'</p>';
							html += '			<h4>'+ city + estate +'</h4>';
							if(val != 'jobs'){
								html += '			<h5>'+ price +'</h5>';
							}
							html += '		</a>';

							if(logo !== null && logo !== '') {
								html += '<div class="logo-client">';
									if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '<a href="'+url_cliente+'" target="_blank">';
									}
		            				html += '<img src="'+ logo +'" width="110" height="50" />';
		            				if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '</a>';
									}
		            			html += '</div>';
		            		}

							html += '	</li>';

						}

						i++;

	            	});

	            	html += '	</ul>';
					html += '</li>';

	            });

	            $('ul.classificado-odia').html(html);

	        });

			vitrineCarrossel();

    	}

    	var vitrineCarrossel = function () {
    		setTimeout(function(){
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					slider = $(".classificado-odia").bxSlider({
						pagerCustom: '#bx-pager',
						auto: true,
						autoControls: false,
						pause: 5000,
						speed:500,
						infiniteLoop:true,
						autoHover: true,
						onSliderLoad: function (currentIndex) {
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideBefore: function(){			
							$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideAfter: function(){
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},		
						controls: false
					});
					$( ".classificado-odia" ).mouseenter(function() {
						$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
					}).mouseleave(function() {
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
					});
					$( "#bx-pager a" ).click(function(){		
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						setTimeout(function(){
						  slider.startAuto();
						}, 200);
					});
				});
				}, 1000);
    	}

    	var vitrineBusca = function () {
    		var form = document.getElementById('form-classificados-busca');
			form.submit();
			return false;
    	}

    	return {
            vitrine: vitrine,
            vitrineCarrossel: vitrineCarrossel,
            vitrineBusca: vitrineBusca
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	destaquesClassificados.vitrine(6);

    });
</script></div></div></div></section><footer class="footer-odia"><div class="footer-topo"><div class="faixa-12"><div class="grid-6 indices"><h5>Editorial</h5><nav><ul><!-- <li><a 	<h2 class="titulo-separar"><span class="e-color-null">Mais lidas</span></h2>
</div><div class="ODILA00103 grid-3 " id="97BCBAF6-D19A-4701-A889-928D3A698A44">
	<ul>
	</ul>
<script>
    var empilhamentoMaislidas = (function() {

    	var json;

    	var maisLidas = function (periodo, limite) {

			switch(periodo) {
				case 'today':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
				break;
				case 'weekend':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-weekend.json';
				break;
				case 'week':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-week.json';
				break;
				case 'month':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-month.json';
				break;
				default:
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
			}

			$('.ODILA00103 ul').html('<li style="border-bottom:0;"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/odia20/ring.gif" width="30" height="30"></li>');

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {

				var html = '';
				var i = 1;
                
	            $.each(data.registros, function(key, val) {

	            	if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {
	            		html += '<li class="titulo"><a href="' + val.url + '" title="' + val.title + '">' + val.title + '</a></li>';
	                }
	                i++;

	            });

	            $('.ODILA00103 ul').html(html);

	        });

    	}

    	return {
            maisLidas: maisLidas
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	empilhamentoMaislidas.maisLidas('today', 5);

    });
</script></div><div class="publicidade ODIPUB00203 grid-3" id="D31DED33-F677-46F4-A89B-10B75380EBA8">
	<div id="retangulo_medio_2">

</div><div class="ODICHA00203 grid-3 entre-componentes" id="6FA054F7-ACF8-404B-B945-23FECCF0F9DC">
	<h2 class="titulo-separar">Newsletter</h2>
	<p>Receba gratuitamente o melhor conteúdo de O DIA no seu e-mail e mantenha-se muito bem informado</p>
	<form>
		<input type="text" placeholder="digite seu e-mail" name="email_optin" />

	</form>
	<div class="optin_result"></div>
	<!-- <small>Deseja cancelar? <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/">Clique aqui</a></small> -->
</div></div></div><div id="area-3"><div id="28C6A744-B702-44E7-9056-724080EBF900" class="faixa-12"><div class="publicidade grid-12 ODIPUB00412" id="90B514EA-A652-487D-8C43-5D118A978EF5">
	<div class="header-classificado">
		
		<div class="info-logo-anuncie">
			<ul>
				<li><a class="logo-classficado" href="http://classificadosodia.com.br/" target="_blank"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/classificado/logo_classimais.png" /></a></li>
				<li class="telefone">Anuncie também pelo DIAFONE<span><small>(21)</small> 2532-5000</span></li>
			</ul>
		</div>

		<form id="form-classificados-busca" method="get" action="http://classificadosodia.com.br/anuncios/busca?q=casa" target="_classificados">
			<input type="text" name="q" placeholder="O que você está procurando?" />
			<input type="submit" name="enviar" value="Anuncie" onclick="destaquesClassificados.vitrineBusca();" />
			<a class="anuncie" href="http://classificadosodia.com.br/panel/login?continue_to=/panel/ads/insert" target="_classificados">Anuncie</a>
		</form>

	</div>
	<div class="timer">
		<div class="progress "></div>
	</div>
	<div id="bx-pager">
		<a data-slide-index="0" href="">Veículos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="1" href="">Imóveis</a>
		<a data-slide-index="2" href="">Empregos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="3" href="">Serviços e Produtos</a>
	</div>

	<ul class="classificado-odia">
	</ul>
<script>
    var destaquesClassificados = (function() {

    	var vitrine = function (limite) {

			var json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/odia/classificados/highlights.json';

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {
				
				var html = '';
                
	            $.each(data, function(key, val) {

	            	var i = 1;

	            	html += '<li>';
					html += '	<ul>';

	            	$.each(val, function(key2, val2) {

	            		var title 		= val2.title;
	            		var description = val2.description;
	            		var city 		= val2.city;
	            		var estate 		= val2.estate;
	            		var price 		= val2.price;
	            		var thumb 		= val2.thumb;
	            		var url 		= val2.url;
	            		var logo		= val2.client.logo;
	            		var url_cliente = val2.client.url;

	            		if(city == null || city == ''){
	            			city = '';
	            		}else{
	            			city = city +' - ';
	            		}

	            		if(price == null || price == '' || price == '0,00'){
	            			price = '';
	            		}else{
	            			price = 'R$ '+ price;
	            		}

	            		if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {

		            		html += '	<li>';
							html += '		<a href="'+ url +'" target="_classificados">';
							html += '			<img src="'+ thumb +'" width="158" height="100" />';
							html += '			<h3>'+ title.substr(0, 12) +'</h3>';
							html += '			<p>'+ description.substr(0, 50); +'</p>';
							html += '			<h4>'+ city + estate +'</h4>';
							if(val != 'jobs'){
								html += '			<h5>'+ price +'</h5>';
							}
							html += '		</a>';

							if(logo !== null && logo !== '') {
								html += '<div class="logo-client">';
									if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '<a href="'+url_cliente+'" target="_blank">';
									}
		            				html += '<img src="'+ logo +'" width="110" height="50" />';
		            				if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '</a>';
									}
		            			html += '</div>';
		            		}

							html += '	</li>';

						}

						i++;

	            	});

	            	html += '	</ul>';
					html += '</li>';

	            });

	            $('ul.classificado-odia').html(html);

	        });

			vitrineCarrossel();

    	}

    	var vitrineCarrossel = function () {
    		setTimeout(function(){
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					slider = $(".classificado-odia").bxSlider({
						pagerCustom: '#bx-pager',
						auto: true,
						autoControls: false,
						pause: 5000,
						speed:500,
						infiniteLoop:true,
						autoHover: true,
						onSliderLoad: function (currentIndex) {
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideBefore: function(){			
							$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideAfter: function(){
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},		
						controls: false
					});
					$( ".classificado-odia" ).mouseenter(function() {
						$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
					}).mouseleave(function() {
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
					});
					$( "#bx-pager a" ).click(function(){		
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						setTimeout(function(){
						  slider.startAuto();
						}, 200);
					});
				});
				}, 1000);
    	}

    	var vitrineBusca = function () {
    		var form = document.getElementById('form-classificados-busca');
			form.submit();
			return false;
    	}

    	return {
            vitrine: vitrine,
            vitrineCarrossel: vitrineCarrossel,
            vitrineBusca: vitrineBusca
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	destaquesClassificados.vitrine(6);

    });
</script></div></div></div><div id="area-4"></div><div id="area-5"></div></section><footer class="footer-odia"><div class="footer-topo"><div class="faixa-12"><div class="grid-6 <script></script></div></div><div id="CBE1EB4E-B469-407A-B25B-96F55C02AE1C" class="faixa-3"><div class="ODICHE00503 grid-3 entre-componentes" id="50D04210-8923-4A52-A64D-9E1EC558EF79">
	<h2 class="titulo-separar"><span class="e-color-null">Mais lidas</span></h2>
</div><div class="ODILA00103 grid-3 " id="AF410775-59E7-4335-B36C-B5AAE3A4D987">
	<ul>
	</ul>
<script>
    var empilhamentoMaislidas = (function() {

    	var json;

    	var maisLidas = function (periodo, limite) {

			switch(periodo) {
				case 'today':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
				break;
				case 'weekend':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-weekend.json';
				break;
				case 'week':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-week.json';
				break;
				case 'month':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-month.json';
				break;
				default:
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
			}

			$('.ODILA00103 ul').html('<li style="border-bottom:0;"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/odia20/ring.gif" width="30" height="30"></li>');

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {

				var html = '';
				var i = 1;
                
	            $.each(data.registros, function(key, val) {

	            	if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {
	            		html += '<li class="titulo"><a href="' + val.url + '" title="' + val.title + '">' + val.title + '</a></li>';
	                }
	                i++;

	            });

	            $('.ODILA00103 ul').html(html);

	        });

    	}

    	return {
            maisLidas: maisLidas
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	empilhamentoMaislidas.maisLidas('today', 5);

    });
</script></div><div class="publicidade ODIPUB00203 grid-3" id="AC783DB3-1C40-433F-9076-E993C990AFC0">

<script>
    var destaquesClassificados = (function() {

    	var vitrine = function (limite) {

			var json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/odia/classificados/highlights.json';

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {
				
				var html = '';
                
	            $.each(data, function(key, val) {

	            	var i = 1;

	            	html += '<li>';
					html += '	<ul>';

	            	$.each(val, function(key2, val2) {

	            		var title 		= val2.title;
	            		var description = val2.description;
	            		var city 		= val2.city;
	            		var estate 		= val2.estate;
	            		var price 		= val2.price;
	            		var thumb 		= val2.thumb;
	            		var url 		= val2.url;
	            		var logo		= val2.client.logo;
	            		var url_cliente = val2.client.url;

	            		if(city == null || city == ''){
	            			city = '';
	            		}else{
	            			city = city +' - ';
	            		}

	            		if(price == null || price == '' || price == '0,00'){
	            			price = '';
	            		}else{
	            			price = 'R$ '+ price;
	            		}

	            		if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {

		            		html += '	<li>';
							html += '		<a href="'+ url +'" target="_classificados">';
							html += '			<img src="'+ thumb +'" width="158" height="100" />';
							html += '			<h3>'+ title.substr(0, 12) +'</h3>';
							html += '			<p>'+ description.substr(0, 50); +'</p>';
							html += '			<h4>'+ city + estate +'</h4>';
							if(val != 'jobs'){
								html += '			<h5>'+ price +'</h5>';
							}
							html += '		</a>';

							if(logo !== null && logo !== '') {
								html += '<div class="logo-client">';
									if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '<a href="'+url_cliente+'" target="_blank">';
									}
		            				html += '<img src="'+ logo +'" width="110" height="50" />';
		            				if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '</a>';
									}
		            			html += '</div>';
		            		}

							html += '	</li>';

						}

						i++;

	            	});

	            	html += '	</ul>';
					html += '</li>';

	            });

	            $('ul.classificado-odia').html(html);

	        });

			vitrineCarrossel();

    	}

    	var vitrineCarrossel = function () {
    		setTimeout(function(){
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					slider = $(".classificado-odia").bxSlider({
						pagerCustom: '#bx-pager',
						auto: true,
						autoControls: false,
						pause: 5000,
						speed:500,
						infiniteLoop:true,
						autoHover: true,
						onSliderLoad: function (currentIndex) {
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideBefore: function(){			
							$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideAfter: function(){
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},		
						controls: false
					});
					$( ".classificado-odia" ).mouseenter(function() {
						$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
					}).mouseleave(function() {
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
					});
					$( "#bx-pager a" ).click(function(){		
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						setTimeout(function(){
						  slider.startAuto();
						}, 200);
					});
				});
				}, 1000);
    	}

    	var vitrineBusca = function () {
    		var form = document.getElementById('form-classificados-busca');
			form.submit();
			return false;
    	}

    	return {
            vitrine: vitrine,
            vitrineCarrossel: vitrineCarrossel,
            vitrineBusca: vitrineBusca
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	destaquesClassificados.vitrine(6);

    });
</script></div></div></div><div id="area-5"></div></section><footer class="footer-odia"><div class="footer-topo"><div class="faixa-12"><div class="grid-6 indices"><h5>Editorial</h5><nav><ul><!--
